name: Mmm Burgers
description:
Mmm Burgers is a fast-paced speed-running platformer where you play as a little Shiba Inu who is hungry!  Within each level, there is/are burger(s)! Upon collecting all the burgers in a level, a portal opens up to the next level. However, be quick as you have a limited amount of time to collect as many burgers as you can! The goal here is to collect as many burgers as you can before the timer runs out. Oh and also avoid humans—humans are annoying as they get in between you and those tasty burgers.

Background 

Unfortunately, the project wasn't finished on time, and as it stands this can be considered a prototype. Regardless, here is my submission for my very first game jam! I will be updating the game following this demo to give you all the complete player experience soon!

Acknowledgments

I  learned so much during my first game jam and thank you to Adrienne Lombardo and Iysander for hosting this jam.  My eyes are burning and I am sleep-deprived BUT this was such a valuable experience.  Congrats to all the participants! I am proud to be amongst all my fellow beginner developers.

Known Bugs:

  • Scaling issues (play in full-screen for the best experience)
  • Burger Counter
    • Burger count does not reset upon pressing "start game"
  • Timer
    • Timer countdown begins on main menu scene
    • Infinite time upon returning to the main menu & pressing Start game

Future Update:

  • Multiple humans
  • New aggro AI
